p: Our client located in Atlanta, Georgia is seeking to hire a Python Developer to join their team. They are seeking an experienced Python software developer with a strong mathematical and/or statistical modeling background to help with the design and development of mathematical calculation modules for the next generation of our successful Azure-based actuarial commercial software suite. The individual will work closely with the PCIS development team to review, test, edit and write Python-based calculation modules that will run in an Azure-based Kubernetes environment.
p.2: Specifically, the individual will work closely with actuarial Subject Matter Experts and Senior Software Developers to perform the following tasks:
p.4: 1. Perform a code review of our existing Python modules,
p.5: 2. Assist with performance and benchmark testing of these modules,
p.6: 3. Make recommendations for how to improve and optimize the modules,
p.7: 4. Optimize these modules to improve performance,
p.8: 5. Work with subject matter experts to understand requirements and to help design, code, and test additional modules.

u: REMOTE role but looking for local Atlanta candidates only.

p.13: Expert-level Python developer with significant experience using NumPy and SciPy
p.15: Team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills
p.16: Solid, proven experience architecting and building business software solutions
